name: Music Racer
description: Music Racer is a musical arcade game, where you get to race at full speed while dodging obstacles to the rhythm of the music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any soundcard
